creator: AMB INFORMACIÓ
descriptionHtml:
If you have the mobile in hand, you can change the way to move you!📱🚌

Now, move you for the metropolitan area is much easier.

AMB Mobilitat is a free app that lets you plan your journey by public transport and cycling route according to your needs

Know the frequency of buses in real time with their routes in the metropolitan area of Barcelona.

Download now AMB Mobilitat... Never miss the bus anymore!

These are the main features of the App:

•INTEGRATED ROUTER: See the best possible combination to make your travel by public transport, bicycle or on foot. You can choose the time of arrival or departure and define the transport that you like.

•GEOLOCATION: locates all integrated transport network in Barcelona, Castelldefels, Cornellà, El Prat, Esplugues, Gavà, L’Hospitalet, Botigues de Sitges, Montcada i Reixac, Montgat, Sant Adrià, Sant Boi, Sant Feliu, Sant Joan Despí, Sant Just Desvern, Santa Coloma, Tiana i Viladecans.

•REAL TIME: frequency of the bus and TRAM in real time.

•NETWORK FOR BICYCLE: See the cycles network of the Metropolitan Area of Barcelona and plan your bike trip.

•NOTICE OF SERVICE: Consult the warnings of the service that affect your lines of transport.

•FAVOURITES: Create a list of favorite stops and customize it to your liking.

•INTEGRATED NETWORK: Know all the details on schedules, routes, and routes of transport bus services in the metropolitan area of Barcelona.

•POLLUTION ALERT: an alert will be activated when there is a warning or declaration of preventive environmental pollution episode


AMB Mobilitat replaces AMBtempsbus offering a new set of services and features to improve the experience for users of public transport.

With App AMB Mobilitat you can find all the information on the line or lines from your usual transport also have the opportunity to find your nearest and knowing how long your bus, all in real time!

Do not hesitate anymore, minimizing the waiting time for public transport with this app!
Municipalities of the Metropolitan Area of Barcelona where you can meet and use public transport timetables and routes service: Barcelona, Castelldefels, Cornella, El Prat, Esplugues, Gavà, L’Hospitalet, Botigues de Sitges, Montcada i Reixac, Montgat, Sant Adrià, Sant Boi, Sant Feliu, Sant Joan Despí, Sant Just Desvern, Santa Coloma, Tiana, Viladecans, etc.


Download the free app disabled in your Android device in real time and know what time of arrival is your bus, and the next one too!

AMB Mobilitat is compatible with all devices running Android version 3.0 and above.

In case you have questions or concerns about the application, you can write to info@ambinformacio.cat.
We will be happy to assist you.
descriptionShort: Plan in real time your trip by public transport in Barcelona

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We continue improving our application with Mobility every day to offer you better information and functionalities that facilitate your mobility in the metropolitan area of Barcelona.

This new version solves some errors detected and includes performance improvements.

title: AMB Mobilitat

creator: AMB INFORMACIÓ
descriptionHtml:
All the information on metropolitan transport on your mobile!

AMB Mobilitat is a free app that integrates all modes of transport to get about in the Barcelona metropolitan area: bus, metro, Rodalies, FGC, TRAM, bicycle, taxi...

Getting about in the Barcelona metropolitan area is now easier than ever. AMB Mobilitat gives you access to information on the frequency of all transport in real time, the availability of the main shared services and the best routes.

Find your nearest stop, plan your journey based on how long it will take for your chosen transport to arrive and get to your destination with the best possible combination.

AMB Mobilitat offers you all the details on:
Estimated arrival in real time
Map of the selected route
Connectivity between all modes of transport
Timetables
Routes of each mode of transport
Availability of shared services in real time

In addition, it has the following functionalities:

FAVOURITES: personalise the mobility services you use most often. Save your favourite stops, lines and places to more easily plan your journeys.

BIKE NETWORK: check out the bike network, available vehicles and bicycle parking facilities in the Barcelona metropolitan area and plan your bicycle trip.

SERVICE UPDATES: check alerts and any alterations to service that affect your preferred transport lines.

POLLUTION ALERT: an alert will be activated when there is a preventive warning or an episode of environmental contamination is declared.

For private vehicle users, it includes relevant information on the various low-emission zones, park-and-ride facilities (P+R) and the nearest charging stations.

Locate the entire integrated transport network in Badalona, Barcelona, Castelldefels, Cervelló, Cornellà de Llobregat, Esplugues de Llobregat, Gavà, L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Molins de Rei, Montcada i Reixac, Montgat, El Papiol, El Prat de Llobregat, San Adrià de Besòs, San Boi de Llobregat, Sant Climent de Llobregat, San Feliu de Llobregat, Sant Joan Despí, Sant Just Desvern, Santa Coloma de Cervelló, Santa Coloma de Gramenet, Tiana and Viladecans.

If you have any doubts or questions about the application, you can write to us at info@ambinformacio.cat.
descriptionShort: Plan in real time your trip by public transport in Barcelona
